name: The Riftbreaker Dedicated Server (Wine)
author: Codex
description: Runs The Riftbreaker Dedicated Server under Wine with xvfb-run. Requires UDP 6321 and TCP 1127 allocations. Installs SteamCMD locally and verifies bin/DedicatedServer.exe.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

if [ ! -w /mnt/server ]; then
  echo "Error: /mnt/server is not writable. Aborting install." >&2
  exit 1
fi

export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
apt-get update
apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends ca-certificates curl lib32gcc-s1 lib32stdc++6 xvfb
rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

if [ ! -f steamcmd.sh ]; then
  curl -sSL "https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz" -o steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
  tar -xzf steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
fi

BRANCH="${STEAM_BETA_BRANCH:-}"
PASSWORD="${STEAM_BETA_PASSWORD:-}"
BETA_ARGS="-beta public"
if [ -n "$BRANCH" ]; then
  BETA_ARGS="-beta ${BRANCH}"
  if [ -n "$PASSWORD" ]; then
    BETA_ARGS+=" -betapassword ${PASSWORD}"
  fi
fi

./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login anonymous +app_update 4114030 ${BETA_ARGS} validate +quit

if [ ! -f /mnt/server/bin/DedicatedServer.exe ]; then
  echo "Error: /mnt/server/bin/DedicatedServer.exe not found after install." >&2
  exit 1
fi

echo "Installation complete."

variables.name: Steam Beta Branch
variables.description: Optional Steam beta branch name. Leave blank for public.

variables.name: Steam Beta Password
variables.description: Optional password for the specified beta branch.
